about.title: About Me
about.name: Eita Horishita
about.introduction: I am a technical research expert specializing in natural language processing and geospatial information analysis. With extensive experience in international development and technology consulting, I help organizations leverage data visualization and analysis for strategic decision-making.
about.brief_history: After graduating from Chiba University with a degree in Urban Environmental Systems, I gained international experience through JICA's Japan Overseas Cooperation Volunteers program in Sri Lanka. I later earned an MSc in International Development from the University of Birmingham, UK. Currently, I work at VALUENEX Japan, where I conduct technology trend analysis and provide consulting services to private companies.
